metadata.title: RA Family: How are signals from analog microphones amplified ?

sections.content:
Question:
How are signals from analog microphones amplified ?
Answer:
Analog microphones pass through Renesas READ2302GSP OPAMP before connecting to analog interface on the microcontroller.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
